title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\Image
name: Image
description:
[Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product] image. Recommendations AI and Retail Search do not use product images to improve prediction and search results. However, product images can be returned in results, and are shown in prediction or search previews in the console.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.Image

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.uri
params.description: Required. URI of the image. This field must be a valid UTF-8 encoded URI with a length limit of 5,000 characters. Otherwise, an INVALID_ARGUMENT error is returned. Google Merchant Center property image_link. Schema.org property Product.image.

params.name: data.height
params.description: Height of the image in number of pixels. This field must be nonnegative. Otherwise, an INVALID_ARGUMENT error is returned.

params.name: data.width
params.description: Width of the image in number of pixels. This field must be nonnegative. Otherwise, an INVALID_ARGUMENT error is returned.
